item.title: Going 4K with the Philips BDM4065UC
item.description: Dual screen setups are great for work but you can’t always have two of the same size/model side by side. In my previous setup I had my laptop display as the primary and a secondary smaller screen. This being sub-optimal I figured it might be a good time to ask for a new display at work. New screens are nice, but what to ask for? Research time! I looked at a bunch of 1440p displays but with 4k becoming a more viable solution I started researching really big screens.
